snippet: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe portrayed the Trans-Pacific Partnership as Japan’s “last chance” to remain an economic power in Asia.
abstract: Prime Min Shinzo Abe says Japan will seek to join negotiations for free-trade pact with United States and other Pacific nations.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe portrayed the Trans-Pacific Partnership as Japan’s “last chance” to remain an economic power in Asia.

headline.seo: Japan Aims to Join Trans-Pacific Partnership Talks
headline.main: Japan Moves to Enter Talks on Pacific Trade
headline.print_headline: Japan Moves to Enter Talks on Pacific Trade
